title: N172 Old Judge Pete "Louisville Slugger" Browning
author: Schwertfeger1007

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge Pete "Louisville Slugger" Browning

posts.post_content: This guy was quite a legend in Kentucky.  The first Louisville Slugger.  There is a book called The Original Louisville SLugger by Tim Newby. It was just released in Sept.
